name.baseName: Regional exploration ; Favorable oil and gas bearing zone ; Geophysical and geochemical exploration survey
区域勘探 ; 有利含油气区带 ; 物化探普查

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The whole process from the beginning of petroleum geological survey in the basin to the optimization of favorable oil-bearing zones. This is the most basic and integral oil and gas exploration based on the region, which has the characteristics of comprehensiveness, regionality and integrity, and is a multi-type comprehensive exploration method
从盆地的石油地质调查开始到优选出有利含油气区带的全过程。这是一种从区域出发，最基础的、整体的油气勘探，具有综合性、区域性、整体性的特点，是多工种综合勘探的方式

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Starting from the region, the overall geological survey
从区域出发，整体地质调查
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the process of regional exploration and identification of favorable oil and gas bearing zones, focusing on comprehensive geophysical and geochemical exploration surveys. Its practical application is typically limited to the oil and gas industry, where it is used to inform decisions about locating and evaluating potential regions for exploratory drilling and subsequent development of gas fields, such as those found in the Sichuan Basin.
该数据集代表了区域勘探和识别有利含油气区带的过程，重点是综合地球物理和地球化学勘探普查。其实际应用通常限于石油和天然气行业，在这里它用于通知关于确定和评估潜在区域的决策，以供勘探钻探和随后开发气田，例如在四川盆地发现的气田。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: From the beginning of the 20th century to the 1980s, the theory of gas formation in China mainly stayed at the stage of oil generation, and the theoretical cognition at this stage limited the possibility of discovering gas reservoirs under more conditions for Chinese researchers
从20世纪初期到80年代，国内对于成气的理论主要停留在油生气阶段，此阶段的理论认知限制了我国科研人员在更多条件下发现气藏的可能性
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: After proving the location of the gas field or drilling natural gas, the natural gas reserves in the target area should be evaluated immediately. Based on the accurate composition analysis of the extracted natural gas, the prediction and evaluation results of natural gas reserves and related subsequent exploitation schemes are optimized according to the conditions of the target area
探明气田位置或者钻探出天然气后，应即时进行目标区域的天然气储量的评价工作。对开采出的天然气进行精确的成分分析，并结合目标区域的条件优化天然气储量的预测评价结果和相关的后续开采方案

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 郭田超;刘博;邓明; 天然气勘探开发研究. 山西化工 101–102 (2022)
郭田超;刘博;邓明; 天然气勘探开发研究. 山西化工 101–102 (2022)

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: Virtual exploration technology based on big data and supercomputing, measurement and control remote sensing technology of satellites and high-altitude unmanned aerial vehicles, etc., have played an important role in the exploration of land-based and sea-based gas fields in recent years. At the same time, the above technologies also provide strong support for proving the growth mechanism of natural gas, such as helping to prove that the key to the development of shale gas in Sichuan Basin lies in the high pressure of reservoir fluid. At the same time, the rapid development of geophysical technology also provides key technical support for the exploration, development and research of natural gas in China
基于大数据和超算的虚拟勘探技术、卫星和高空无人机的测控遥感技术等，在近年来的陆基和海基气田的勘探过程中均发挥了重要作用。同时上述技术也为天然气的成长机制的探明提供了有力支持，如帮助探明四川盆地的页岩气的发育关键在于储层流体高压等。同时发展越来越迅速的地球物理技术也为我国的天然气勘探开发和研究工作提供了关键的技术支持
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users should apply this data in the context of regional geological surveys and exploration activities, accounting for advancements in theories of gas formation and exploration technologies. Methodological advice includes immediate evaluation of gas reserves upon discovery, precise component analysis of natural gas, and adjusting exploitation plans based on target area conditions. Users should also consider recent technological developments in virtual exploration and remote sensing when interpreting the data. It is essential to incorporate the pressure conditions of reservoir fluids, specifically in contexts similar to the development of shale gas in Sichuan Basin.
用户应在区域地质调查和勘探活动的背景下应用此数据，考虑成气理论和勘探技术的进步。 方法论建议包括在发现时立即评估气田储备，对天然气进行精确的成分分析，并根据目标区域条件调整开采计划。 用户在解释数据时还应考虑虚拟勘探和遥感技术的最新技术发展。 必须特别考虑储层流体的压力条件，特别是在与四川盆地页岩气开发类似的背景中。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: In 2021, China's proven shale gas reserves on land and sea exceeded 6.8E08m3
2021 年，我国在海陆的页岩气探明储量超过 6.8E08m3
